Name: Pan-Pan
About the game: Might and Delight, in collaboration with SPELKRAFT, invites you to explore a world lush with colour and punctuated by the tranquil sounds of a melodic soundtrack. Welcome to the world of Pan-Pan! Before we delve further into Pan-Pan , we hope you don't mind us taking this opportunity to tell you about our latest game, the Tiny Multiplayer Online RPG Book of Travels! / About Pan-Pan : Set against a backdrop of soothing ambient sounds crafted by renowned sound composer, Simon Viklund, Pan-Pan is an open-plain adventure that expands on environmental-narrative storytelling with puzzle solving and exploration elements at its core. Your task is to fix your downed spaceship and begin the pilgrimage home. In a world littered with world shifting riddles and sprinkled with the memorable characters - how you solve these riddles is firmly in your hands. Main features: Set in an open world: Unlock new areas by collecting items and solving puzzles. Stellar soundtrack created by acclaimed sound producer â€“ Simon Viklund. A balanced blend of exploration and puzzle solving game mechanics. Story beats told through environmental interactions. Use a mix of tools, gadgets and devices to solve puzzles and uncover the path home. Don't forget to wishlist our upcoming games: /
